name: Defender '41
description:
Take control of the awesome Spitfire and survive waves of snappers*. Take out as many of the enemy as possible in a simple, endless, hi-score vertical shoot-em-up. Inspired by my recent reading of Geoffrey Wellum's First Light.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move.

Machine Guns - Space

Entirely Ahistoric Missile Launcher - Left Alt

"Works best with a gamepad I find" - Veteran Spitfire pilot

An elaboration of one of my C# learning exercises. 

Coding/Graphics/SFX - Gareth Clarke

Intro music by Coconums (https://soundcloud.com/pixelisacat)

In-game music by Komiku (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku)

There's loads I'd love to add/do better but it's time to move onto the next project. I may return to this in the future though as it's been a fun one!

*Codename for Messerschmitt 109s.
